meanings.definition: To convert a sum of money into an annuity.
meanings.sent1: I will annuitize my savings to receive monthly payments.
meanings.sent2: It is common to annuitize a retirement fund for steady income.
meanings.sent3: Why not annuitize your bonus for a monthly treat?
meanings.sent4: She decided to annuitize her inheritance, turning it into a steady stream of income.
meanings.sent5: Annuitizing your savings can provide financial security in the long term.

meanings.definition: To make periodic payments from an annuity.
meanings.sent1: After retirement, he chose to annuitize his pension for regular income.
meanings.sent2: Many people annuitize their investments to ensure a stable cash flow.
meanings.sent3: The decision to annuitize your winnings can bring peace of mind.
meanings.sent4: She planned to annuitize her lottery winnings to enjoy a steady income.
meanings.sent5: Annuitizing an annuity can create a reliable source of funds over time.
